description: This file provides a utility function ping_host that pings a specified IP address once, with a configurable timeout, and returns whether the host is reachable along with the raw output message.

methods.name: Tuple[bool,str] ping_host(ip: str, timeout_ms: int = 2000)
methods.description: Pings a host once with a specified timeout, returning a tuple indicating if the host is online and the raw output message.

parameters.ip: The IP address of the host to ping.
parameters.timeout_ms: Timeout in milliseconds for the ping request, default is 2000 ms.

ctags.name: ping_host
ctags.pattern: /^def ping_host(ip: str, timeout_ms: int = 2000) -> Tuple[bool, str]:$/
